attributes.action: Top Gear Broadcast, Should Be Decided By The Public
attributes.additional_details: As a contributor towards the funding and running of the British Broadcasting Corporation, the present feud between Jeremy Clarkson and the organisation, should not interfere with any prior scheduling.  In short, the BBC should not have taken the decision to take the current series off air.....it is the public who should decide. The current groundswell of positive opinion in favour of Jeremy Clarkson and especially Top Gear, should indicate to the BBC, that we, the paying licence payers, should not or will not be dictated to, by faceless do-gooders in flip flops and suits.
